com.opengamma.strata.calc.config.pricing

Interface PricingRules

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPricingRules

    public interface PricingRules
    Pricing rules specify how a measure should be calculated for a target.

    Pricing rules return a configured function group that provides function configuration for calculating a value. The function group specifies which function implementation should be used for the calculation and also provides any arguments for configuring the function.

      • composedWith

        default PricingRules composedWith(PricingRules otherRules)
        Combines these rules with the specified rules.

        The resulting rules will return mappings from this rule if available, otherwise mappings will be returned from the other rule.

        Parameters:
        otherRules - the other rules
        Returns:
        the combined rules
